channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I Tested Popular Functional Coffee Add-Ins for a Week Each (2026)
item.description: Our reviewer optimized his morning cup of coffee with creamer substitutes that promise health benefits and mental clarity.

item.title: ‘College dropout’ has become the most coveted startup founder credential
item.description: AI founders are increasingly using their "dropout" status as a credential during YC pitches.

item.title: How to Make It Through Cold and Flu Season
item.description: Reduce your chances of catching these respiratory illnesses, and make sure you don't spread it to others.

item.title: Here’s What It’s Like to Use Acuity Scheduling for Your Business or Side Hustle (2026)
item.description: The online booking platform aims to streamline scheduling for everything from virtual appointments to workshops.

item.title: AI Labor Is Boring. AI Lust Is Big Business
item.description: After years of hype about generative AI increasing productivity and making lives easier, 2025 was the year erotic chatbots defined AI’s narrative.

item.title: 10 Tech Cleanup Tasks for New Year's Day
item.description: Knock out these simple chores on this day of fresh starts to keep you and your devices humming smoothly.

item.title: Tade Oyerinde and Teddy Solomon talk about building engaged audiences at TechCrunch Disrupt
item.description: Founders Tade Oyerinde and Teddy Solomon spoke at Disrupt this year about keeping communities engaged.

item.title: Every fusion startup that has raised over $100M
item.description: Fusion startups have raised $7.1 billion to date, with the majority of it going to a handful of companies.

item.title: Investors predict AI is coming for labor in 2026
item.description: The exact impact AI will have on the enterprise labor market is unclear but investors predict trends will start to emerge in 2026.

item.title: These are the best gadgets for your pet right now
item.description: From AI smart cameras that describe your pet's actions to a smart door that knows when they want to go outside, these are the best pet gadgets of 2025...
